issue.title: [CF 1232] Increase & Decrease Triggers
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

Please provide any additional information below.

Under the "On Stacks Changed" notification, it wuld be handy if there were two more triggers, One for an Increase in stacks and one for a Decrease in stacks.


> Posted by CurseForge user WaterlolWoW | Imported from CurseForge issue #1232 | Raw
